Encryption.description: Information about the encryption of the flow.

Algorithm.description: The type of algorithm that is used for the encryption (such as aes128, aes192, or aes256).
Algorithm.markdownDescription:
The type of algorithm that is used for the encryption (such as aes128, aes192, or aes256).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: aes128 | aes192 | aes256  
Update requires: No interruption

ConstantInitializationVector.description: A 128-bit, 16-byte hex value represented by a 32-character string, to be used with the key for encrypting content. This parameter is not valid for static key encryption.
ConstantInitializationVector.markdownDescription:
A 128-bit, 16-byte hex value represented by a 32-character string, to be used with the key for encrypting content. This parameter is not valid for static key encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

DeviceId.description: The value of one of the devices that you configured with your digital rights management (DRM) platform key provider. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.
DeviceId.markdownDescription:
The value of one of the devices that you configured with your digital rights management (DRM) platform key provider. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

KeyType.description: The type of key that is used for the encryption. If no keyType is provided, the service will use the default setting (static-key).
KeyType.markdownDescription:
The type of key that is used for the encryption. If no keyType is provided, the service will use the default setting (static-key).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: speke | static-key | srt-password  
Update requires: No interruption

Region.description: The AWS Region that the API Gateway proxy endpoint was created in. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.
Region.markdownDescription:
The AWS Region that the API Gateway proxy endpoint was created in. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceId.description: An identifier for the content. The service sends this value to the key server to identify the current endpoint. The resource ID is also known as the content ID. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.
ResourceId.markdownDescription:
An identifier for the content. The service sends this value to the key server to identify the current endpoint. The resource ID is also known as the content ID. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The ARN of the role that you created during setup (when you set up AWS Elemental MediaConnect as a trusted entity).
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the role that you created during setup (when you set up AWS Elemental MediaConnect as a trusted entity).

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SecretArn.description: The ARN of the secret that you created in AWS Secrets Manager to store the encryption key. This parameter is required for static key encryption and is not valid for SPEKE encryption.
SecretArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the secret that you created in AWS Secrets Manager to store the encryption key. This parameter is required for static key encryption and is not valid for SPEKE encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Url.description: The URL from the API Gateway proxy that you set up to talk to your key server. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.
Url.markdownDescription:
The URL from the API Gateway proxy that you set up to talk to your key server. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Encryption.markdownDescription:
Information about the encryption of the flow.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

GatewayBridgeSource.description: The source configuration for cloud flows receiving a stream from a bridge.

BridgeArn.description: The ARN of the bridge feeding this flow.
BridgeArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the bridge feeding this flow.

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcInterfaceAttachment.description: The name of the VPC interface attachment to use for this bridge source.
VpcInterfaceAttachment.markdownDescription:
The name of the VPC interface attachment to use for this bridge source.

Update requires: No interruption

VpcInterfaceAttachment.description: The settings for attaching a VPC interface to an resource.

The name of the VPC interface to use for this resource.

VpcInterfaceAttachment.markdownDescription:

FlowArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the flow.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Decryption.description: The type of encryption that is used on the content ingested from this source.
Decryption.markdownDescription:
The type of encryption that is used on the content ingested from this source.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: A description for the source. This value is not used or seen outside of the current AWS Elemental MediaConnect account.
Description.markdownDescription:
A description for the source. This value is not used or seen outside of the current AWS Elemental MediaConnect account.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EntitlementArn.description: The ARN of the entitlement that allows you to subscribe to content that comes from another AWS account. The entitlement is set by the content originator and the ARN is generated as part of the originator's flow.
EntitlementArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the entitlement that allows you to subscribe to content that comes from another AWS account. The entitlement is set by the content originator and the ARN is generated as part of the originator's flow.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

GatewayBridgeSource.description: The source configuration for cloud flows receiving a stream from a bridge.
GatewayBridgeSource.markdownDescription:
The source configuration for cloud flows receiving a stream from a bridge.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

IngestPort.description: The port that the flow will be listening on for incoming content.
IngestPort.markdownDescription:
The port that the flow will be listening on for incoming content.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

MaxBitrate.description: The smoothing max bitrate for RIST, RTP, and RTP-FEC streams.
MaxBitrate.markdownDescription:
The smoothing max bitrate for RIST, RTP, and RTP-FEC streams.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

MaxLatency.description: The maximum latency in milliseconds. This parameter applies only to RIST-based and Zixi-based streams.
MaxLatency.markdownDescription:
The maximum latency in milliseconds. This parameter applies only to RIST-based and Zixi-based streams.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

MinLatency.markdownDescription:
The minimum latency in milliseconds.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the source.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Protocol.description: The protocol that is used by the source.
Protocol.markdownDescription:
The protocol that is used by the source.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: zixi-push | rtp-fec | rtp | rist | srt-listener | srt-caller  
Update requires: No interruption

SenderIpAddress.description: The IP address that the flow communicates with to initiate connection with the sender for fujitsu-qos protocol.
SenderIpAddress.markdownDescription:
The IP address that the flow communicates with to initiate connection with the sender for fujitsu-qos protocol.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SenderControlPort.markdownDescription:

---

Required: No

Update requires: No interruption

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Source IP or domain name for SRT-caller protocol.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SourceListenerPort.markdownDescription:
Source port for SRT-caller protocol.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcInterfaceName.description: The name of the VPC Interface this Source is configured with.
VpcInterfaceName.markdownDescription:
The name of the VPC Interface this Source is configured with.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

WhitelistCidr.description: The range of IP addresses that should be allowed to contribute content to your source. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.
WhitelistCidr.markdownDescription:
The range of IP addresses that should be allowed to contribute content to your source. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.

Update requires: No interruption
